item.description: The Little Rhodie Bully Breed Club, Inc. is hosting a "Show me Your PITS Mardi Gras Festival" to raise public awareness and funds for shelter pit bulls in Rhode Island! ~~~ There will be a doggie costume contest and parade for dogs to show off their carnival spirit! There will also be games, prizes, and raffles. ~~~ All dogs in attendance must be leashed and up to date on their rabies vaccine. Please, no dog-aggressive dogs. ~~~ Sunday, February 26, 2012 (Rain/Snow date will be March 4). ~~~ 2:00 p.m. ~~~ $5.00 donation appreciated ~~~ Hope to see you there! ~~~ Here is the link for additional contact information: http://providenceonli....
item.name: Show Me Your PITS Mardi Gras Festival hosted by the Little Rhodie Bully Club
